text: O te, kotoryye uverovali! Ne bud'te pokhozhi na neveruyushchikh, kotoryye skazali o svoikh brat'yakh, kogda oni stranstvovali po zemle ili uchastvovali v pokhode: «Yesli by oni byli ryadom s nami, to ne umerli by i ne byli by ubity», - daby Allakh sdelal eto prichinoy skorbi v ikh serdtsakh. Allakh ozhivlyayet i umershchvlyayet, i Allakh vidit to, chto vy sovershayete
